oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial photograph of West Nashville, ca. 1968.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of West Nashville looking southwest, circa 1968, taken by Metro Photographer William M. King. Photograph shows a wooded residential area adjacent to the construction of I-40 which extends from the middle-right of the image to the center, where it intersects with construction of I-440 headed east. I-440 continues to the left of the photo while I-40 snakes to the right. Streets identified in the photo include Batavia St., Clifton Ave., and 28th Avenue. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
